duties_responsibilities.duty: Take incoming calls from customers and make outgoing calls for follow-up and customer assistance.
Answer questions and resolve concerns on a range of topics regarding end-of-term leases.
Respond to a high volume of calls and follow up as necessary to resolve customer concerns.
Use interpersonal finesse to build rapport and support diverse stakeholders and personalities.
Maintain a friendly and helpful persona while communicating on the phone throughout the day.
